Name: Anything Else
Ingredients: 50 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Zesty lemon, bitter liqueur and tangy IPA makes for a zippy, refreshing drink. A characterful IPA and nailing exactly the right amount of honey are key to this drink's success.
History: Originally made with Bacardi Carta Blanca , this was the Belarus Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail and was created by Lizaveta Molyavka at News Café in Minsk.
Nutrition: One serving of Anything Else contains 182 calories
